General.Name: Brightek Optoelectronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Brightek Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and trading of optoelectronic elements in Taiwan. The company offers various range of products including lighting and display, iCLed, and lamp products. It operates through Asia, America, Europe, and Internationally. The company was formerly known as Taiwan Brightek Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Brightek Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. in 2009. Brightek Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1492-1, Chunri Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 33051
